item.title: Closed Lords of Waterdeep
item.description: The shadowy group of individuals run Waterdeep while hidden behind magical robes and masks that obfuscate their identities

item.title: Doom Raiders
item.description: Summary An adventuring party not unlike the Trollskull crew After raiding every dungeon they could, they founded a mercenary compamy named the Black Network Eventually, they allied themselves with Manshoon leading to the Black Network’s transformation in to the Zhentarim They all hate each other.

item.title: Factions
item.description: The Trollskull Team Doom Raiders An ex-adventuring party turned mercenary group turned gang generals turned unlikely allies to the party

item.title: Force Gray
item.description: Summary Led by Vajra Safahr - the Blackstaff and head mage in Waterdeep

item.title: The Trollskull Team
item.description: Objectives [!info] Primary Goal Recover the treasure Renear’s father Dagult embezzled from the city and hid Stone of Golorr, with all 3 eyes, will reveal it’s location Manshoon and the Cassalanter Family hold the remaining eyes [!

item.title: Zhentarim
item.description: Summary A mercenary company turned gang that the Doom Raiders helped Manshoon found to fund his extremely expensive magical experiments
